allProviders.name: Port Calanova
allProviders.description:
## Highlights
Port Calanova is a modern marina and sailing school located in the bay of Palma, just 5 km from the city center. Established in 1976, this marina is ideal for both boating enthusiasts and holidaymakers looking to explore the clear waters and nearby attractions. It offers a wide range of water sports, including sailing, kayaking, and paddleboarding, and has accommodation options at the Calanova Sports Residence. The port is also home to two restaurants and various facilities like a gym and pool, making it a popular spot for relaxation and activities.

## Services
Port Calanova offers 172 berths for boats up to 25 meters, along with a shipyard providing services like cleaning, maintenance, and repairs. Visitors can also rent boats or participate in water sports like windsurfing or stand-up paddleboarding. The marina has a fuel dock, showers, Wi-Fi, and laundry facilities. For those staying on land, the Calanova Sports Residence provides accommodation, and the marina hosts events and sailing camps year-round.

## Location
Port Calanova is situated on Avenida Joan Mir√≥, 327, just 15 minutes from Palma's airport. It‚Äôs close to some of Palma‚Äôs major attractions, including Marivent Palace and Illetas Beach, and offers easy access to the city‚Äôs vibrant center and coastline.

## User Experiences
Visitors appreciate the friendly and professional service at Port Calanova. Many highlight the wide variety of activities, from water sports to relaxed dining at the marina's restaurants. The calm atmosphere and excellent facilities make it a great choice for families and boating enthusiasts alike, while the beautiful views of the bay and proximity to Palma‚Äôs sights add to its appeal.

allProviders.name: Petit Nola

## Highlights
Petit Nola, located in Palma's Portixol neighborhood, is a cozy and healthy-focused eatery offering fresh, seasonal ingredients in a relaxed setting. The menu emphasizes nutritious, Mediterranean-inspired dishes, with options like homemade salads, fresh smoothies, and plant-based meals. The laid-back atmosphere, paired with their focus on local and organic products, makes Petit Nola a great spot for breakfast, brunch, or a casual lunch.

## Menu
The menu at Petit Nola focuses on fresh, healthy options, including items such as avocado toast, quinoa bowls, and freshly squeezed juices. Popular for its nutritious yet delicious meals, it also offers homemade cakes and vegan-friendly dishes, making it a go-to for those seeking wholesome, flavorful food.

## Location
Petit Nola is located at Carrer del Vicari Joaquim Forster, 95, in the trendy Portixol area of Palma. It's a perfect place to stop by while exploring the seaside promenade, offering a welcoming spot for both locals and tourists.

## User Experiences
Guests appreciate the fresh, healthy options and friendly service at Petit Nola. Many reviews highlight the vibrant dishes and cozy atmosphere, perfect for a relaxed brunch or lunch. The restaurant's commitment to quality, organic ingredients and its casual, inviting setting make it a top choice for those seeking nutritious meals in Palma.

The hotel boasts premium facilities like an extensive spa with a wet area and treatments, a fitness center, and several swimming pools. Dining options include the renowned Guethary gourmet restaurant and a rooftop champagne bar with stunning sunset views. Guests can also enjoy live entertainment and a variety of family-friendly services, including kids' clubs and babysitting.

The Star Prestige service, with its private rooftop and pool, is a favorite among visitors looking for an extra touch of luxury. While some guests note that the buffet could improve, most praise the hotel for its cleanliness, modern rooms, and convenient location.

Big Blue Diving Mallorca is a well-regarded dive center in Palmanova, offering diving experiences for all levels, from beginners to advanced divers. The center is known for its professional yet friendly instructors, high safety standards, and access to some of the best dive sites in Mallorca, such as the marine reserve at El Toro. Big Blue Diving provides a range of diving courses, including Open Water and Advanced certifications. They offer boat diving, shore diving, and snorkeling trips, with top-notch equipment available. The dive center operates with both PADI and SSI certifications. The team ensures a safe and enjoyable diving experience, with a focus on high-quality service and environmental responsibility.

## Location
The center is located in Palmanova, Mallorca, within walking distance from the beach. From here, guests can explore the underwater beauty of Mallorca‚Äôs southwestern coast, known for its rich marine life and excellent visibility.

## User Experiences

The diving team is multilingual, and the positive atmosphere is frequently mentioned as a reason for returning.
